name: Amigo: Kebab Simulator
description:
Friend!
Welcome to my local Doner Kebabs.
I need your help to run my business while I'm away.
You will have to take care of placing the orders, keeping the premises clean and properly serving the customers; because these bastards get involved in putting negative reviews and in the end the health workers close the business for me.
Although illo, they say that if you only have positive reviews they give you a prize with a piece of money, but I have never seen one of those in my life.
If you need it, you can improve the place by buying more furniture.

Well, I'll leave you with the Shawarma, you're already telling me.

We are aware that the game has bugs, all bugs or improvements will be patched
